channel.title: Path of Reason PODCASTS
channel.description:
Are you in search of answers to big questions? Path of Reason is a useful site for anyone with questions about belief, religion, philosophy, and life in general.
Reason is the internal compass we use to guide us down the path of life.
"Reason is that in which we are all agreed, or at least the majority... Reason is social; truth, usually, is completely individual, personal and difficult to communicate. Reason unites us and truth separates."
- Miguel Unamuno, philosopher
www.pathofreason.com
channel.itunes:subtitle: Do you follow the path of reason?
channel.itunes:author: Path of Reason

item.title: POR Podcast 12-14 - Is Atheism Stupid? 2-4
item.description: After receiving some feedback from the last podcast, Adam and Derek crush the remaining Christian "arguments" in this blitz of podcasts 12-14. Send a message through http://www.pathofreason.com and let them know what you think! Running Time: approx. 44 minutes
item.dc:creator: Path of Reason
item.itunes:summary:
After receiving some feedback from the last podcast, Adam and Derek crush the remaining Christian "arguments" in this blitz of podcasts 12-14.
Send a message through http://www.pathofreason.com and let them know what you think!
Running Time: approx. 44 minutes

item.title: POR Podcast 11 - Is Atheism Stupid? 1 of 4
item.description: Adam and Derek start off the first in a series of 4 podcasts entitled, Is Atheism Stupid?, in response to an email from a Christian giving 40 arguments why atheism is stupid and Christianity is not. Enjoy! Please be sure to check out http://www.pathofreason.com for updates! Running Time: approx. 39 minutes
item.dc:creator: Path of Reason
item.itunes:summary:

Running Time: approx. 39 minutes

item.title: POR Podcast 10.5 - kNOwRELIGION Convo
item.description: Here is a candid discussion with Joseph R. Hanson of http://kNOwReligion.net and Adam and Derek following an interview about faith, belief, religion, spirituality, Christianity, atheism etc. Running Time: approx. 23 minutes
item.dc:creator: Path of Reason
item.itunes:summary:

Running Time: approx. 23 minutes

item.title: POR Podcast 10 - kNOwRELIGION.net
item.description: Joseph R. Hanson of http://kNOwReligion.net joins Derek for an interview about faith, belief, religion, spirituality, Christianity, atheism etc. The podcast to follow this one will be a more candid conversation between Joseph, Derek, and Adam. Running Time: approx. 25 minutes
item.dc:creator: Path of Reason
item.itunes:summary:
Joseph R. Hanson of http://kNOwReligion.net joins Derek for an interview about faith, belief, religion, spirituality, Christianity, atheism etc.
The podcast to follow this one will be a more candid conversation between Joseph, Derek, and Adam.
Running Time: approx. 25 minutes

item.title: POR Podcast 9 - Expelled Exposed
item.description: In Podcast 9, Adam briefly discusses the controversy surrounding Ben Stein's movie, Expelled: No Intelligence Allowed, how to get free science DVDs, Derek's mormon project, and what's up for podcast #10! Please be sure to check out the http://www.pathofreason.com for updates! Running Time: approx. 8 minutes
item.dc:creator: Path of Reason
item.itunes:summary:

Please be sure to check out the http://www.pathofreason.com for updates!
Running Time: approx. 8 minutes

item.title: POR Podcast 8 - Meeting Richard Dawkins
item.description: After some necessary downtime, in Podcast 8, Adam and Derek discuss their experience meeting Richard Dawkins on his God Delusion Book Tour, the First Freedom First simulcast, starting a local freethought group, etc. Please be sure to check out the http://www.pathofreason.com for updates! Running Time: approx. 28 minutes
item.dc:creator: Path of Reason
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: POR Podcast #7 - Religious Right
item.description: Welcoming 2008, Derek and Adam discuss H. R. 888, the religious right, Fighting Words by Robin Morgan, Church-State separation event, Expelled the movie, etc. Please be sure to check out the important and helpful links regarding these issues at http://www.pathofreason.com. Running Time: approx. 35 minutes
item.dc:creator: Path of Reason

item.title: POR Podcast #6 - Just For Fun!
item.description: DISCLAIMER! This year-end Path of Reason podcast is more laid back and informal than usual (i.e. it is unedited and has all the bloopers and a few profanities)! We just wanted to have fun this time around and discuss things like: - Islam - Our church-going days - Girls Gone Wild (for Christ) - Irenaeus and the Four Gospels - Early Christianity - Marrying author, Elaine Pagels ***Thanks to all of our listeners! We'll be back with more podcasts in 2008!*** Running Time: approx. 48 minutes Keep checking out http://www.pathofreason.com for updates etc!
item.dc:creator: Path of Reason
item.itunes:summary:
DISCLAIMER!
This year-end Path of Reason podcast is more laid back and informal than usual (i.e. it is unedited and has all the bloopers and a few profanities)! We just wanted to have fun this time around and discuss things like:
- Islam - Our church-going days - Girls Gone Wild (for Christ) - Irenaeus and the Four Gospels - Early Christianity - Marrying author, Elaine Pagels
***Thanks to all of our listeners! We'll be back with more podcasts in 2008!***
Running Time: approx. 48 minutes
Keep checking out http://www.pathofreason.com for updates etc!

item.title: POR Podcast #5 - Minister Turns Atheist
item.description: Adam and Derek interview minister turned atheist, Joe E. Holman and discuss his experience, christianity, morality, etc. Holman's book, "Project Bible Truth: A Minister Turns Atheist and Tells All." will be released January 2008. Check out his website at http://www.ministerturnsatheist.org *Wonder how much it has cost to run Path of Reason? Check out the DONATE page at http://www.pathofreason.com/donate and help out! Running Time: approx. 45 min.
item.dc:creator: Path of Reason
item.itunes:summary:
Adam and Derek interview minister turned atheist, Joe E. Holman and discuss his experience, christianity, morality, etc.
Holman's book, "Project Bible Truth: A Minister Turns Atheist and Tells All." will be released January 2008.
Check out his website at http://www.ministerturnsatheist.org
*Wonder how much it has cost to run Path of Reason? Check out the DONATE page at http://www.pathofreason.com/donate and help out!
Running Time: approx. 45 min.

item.title: POR Podcast # 4 - Not Finding Faith
item.description: In Podcast #4: Adam talks more about his recent review of Finding Faith: A Search for What Makes Sense by Brian D. McLaren. Path of Reason joins the OUT Campaign. Judgment Day: Intelligent Design on trial. Running Time: approx. 15 minutes
item.dc:creator: Path of Reason
item.itunes:summary:
In Podcast #4:
Adam talks more about his recent review of Finding Faith: A Search for What Makes Sense by Brian D. McLaren.
Path of Reason joins the OUT Campaign.
Judgment Day: Intelligent Design on trial.
Running Time: approx. 15 minutes

item.title: POR Podcast # 3 - The False Miracle of Jesus.
item.description:
Here, Derek presents a dissection of one of the miracles of Jesus as described in the Bible. More proof of the Bible working against itself.

Be sure to check out the reference materials mentioned in this podcast by going to www.pathofreason.com

Running Time: approx. 34 minutes

item.title: POR Podcast # 2 - Answering an Email...
item.description: Here, Derek replies to an email from a Christian visitor to our site and gives some info on updates. Running Time: approx. 4 minutes.
item.dc:creator: Path of Reason
item.itunes:summary:

item.title: POR Podcast #1 - Into the realm of AUDIO!
item.description: Here's the first Path of Reason podcast where Derek and Adam discuss crazy Christians, miracles, worshiping pens, common sense, ya know...the usual. Running Time: approx. 37 minutes
